name: Uncomfortable Gaming Night
description:
You just got a new game and want to play it. But while doing so, strange things happen in your house. What will you do when things escalate?

Uncomfortable Gaming Night is a short horror experience where you play a game inside the game while also doing stuff like doing chores and making sure your food doesn't burn.

The game is not finished yet. Currently it is playable from start to finish. Many improvements will be made when I have the time (& motivation) for it.

Source Code: Maki99999/isekai-fake-rpg (github.com)
